TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract AppointmentItem implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._AppointmentItem, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ItemEvents_10_Event

summary.span: 代表“日历”文件夹中的会议、一次性约会、定期约会或会议。

span.span: Represents a meeting, a one-time appointment, or a recurring appointment or meeting in the Calendar folder.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 使用方法创建一个表示新约会的AppointmentItem对象。

span.span: Use the method to create an AppointmentItem object that represents a new appointment.

para.span: 使用()，其中是约会或用来匹配的默认属性为约会，从日历文件夹中返回单个AppointmentItem对象的值的索引号。

span.span: Use (), where is the index number of an appointment or a value used to match the default property of an appointment, to return a single AppointmentItem object from a Calendar folder.

para.span: 您还可以返回AppointmentItem对象从对象使用方法。

span.span: You can also return an AppointmentItem object from a object by using the method.

para.span: 当使用定期约会项目时，您应当先释放以前的所有引用，再获取对定期约会项目的新引用，然后才访问或修改项目，并在完成和保存更改后立即释放这些引用。

span.span: When you work with recurring appointment items, you should release any prior references, obtain new references to the recurring appointment item before you access or modify the item, and release these references as soon as you are finished and have saved the changes.

para.span: 这种做法应用于定期AppointmentItem对象，以及任何或对象。

span.span: This practice applies to the recurring AppointmentItem object, and any or object.

para.span: 若要在 Visual Basic 中释放引用，需将现有对象设置为 Nothing。

span.span: To release a reference in Visual Basic, set that existing object to Nothing.

para.span: 在 C# 中，明确释放相应对象占用的内存。

span.span: In C#, explicitly release the memory for that object.

para.span: 请注意，即使在释放了您的引用并尝试获取新引用之后，如果其他外接程序或 Outlook 中仍有对以上某个对象的活动引用，您新的引用将仍指向该对象的过期副本。因此，您在完成定期约会后立即释放您的引用是非常重要的。

span.span: Note that even after you release your reference and attempt to obtain a new reference, if there is still an active reference, held by another add-in or Outlook, to one of the above objects, your new reference will still point to an out-of-date copy of the object. Therefore, it is important that you release your references as soon as you are finished with the recurring appointment.
